Reference

All functions

ad_row()

Create a single row in the ad table

ad_table()

Create an ad_table from results

adlib_build_query()

Build an Ad Library Query

adlib_clear_setup()

Clear saved settings

adlib_data_frame()

Convert Ad Library response to tibble

adlib_get()

Query the Ad Library API

adlib_get_paginated()

Paginated query to the ad library API

adlib_response_to_tables()

Parse a response to create three tables

adlib_set_longterm_token()

Set long term token

adlib_setup()

Set up application ID and app secret.

as_tibble(<adlib_data_response>)

Convert a data response to tibble

demographic_row()

Result Row

demographic_table()

Turn data from the data field in response content into a demographics table

extract_error_message()

Extract an error message from a response to pass as an R error

format_array()

Format a vector as a json array

graph_api_endpoint()

API endpoints

graph_get()

Get results from Facebook Ad library

region_table()

Region Table

token_delete()

Delete your stored token

token_get()

Retrieve a stored access token
